
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 switchport access vlan 100
 switchport port-security mac-address sticky 0011.2233.4455
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/2
 switchport access vlan 200
 switchport port-security mac-address sticky aabb.ccdd.eeff
 switchport port-security mac-address sticky 1122.3344.5566
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/3
 description Uplink
 no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/4
 switchport access vlan 300
 switchport port-security mac-address sticky dead.beef.0001
!
end
